TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit GeographicPositionExtensions extends System.Object

MemberSignature.Value: public static UnitsNet.Angle DirectionTo (this Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition position1, Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition position2);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype UnitsNet.Angle DirectionTo(class Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition position1, class Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition position2) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function DirectionTo (position1 As GeographicPosition, position2 As GeographicPosition) As Angle
static member DirectionTo : Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition * Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition -> UnitsNet.Angle

Docs.param: The initial position. This argument can be implicitly given
Docs.summary: Calculates the initial angle to travel to get to another position. Calculates on the great circle, therefore the direction to the target is not constant along the path
Docs.remarks: If both distance and direction are required, prefer to use

static member DistanceTo : Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition * Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition -> UnitsNet.Length

Docs.param: The first position. This argument can be implicitly given
Docs.summary: Calculate the distance to another position
Docs.returns: The distance between the two points

Docs.summary: Move a certain distance into a direction. Where do I end?

MemberSignature.Value: public static Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition NormalizeLongitudeTo180Degrees (this Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition position);
.method public static hidebysig class Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition NormalizeLongitudeTo180Degrees(class Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition position) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function NormalizeLongitudeTo180Degrees (position As GeographicPosition) As GeographicPosition
static member NormalizeLongitudeTo180Degrees : Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition -> Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition

Docs.summary: Normalizes the longitude to +/- 180° This is the common form for displaying longitudes. is used when the area of interest is close to the date border (in the pacific ocean)

MemberSignature.Value: public static Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition NormalizeLongitudeTo360Degrees (this Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition position);
.method public static hidebysig class Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition NormalizeLongitudeTo360Degrees(class Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition position) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function NormalizeLongitudeTo360Degrees (position As GeographicPosition) As GeographicPosition
static member NormalizeLongitudeTo360Degrees : Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition -> Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition

Docs.summary: Normalizes the longitude to [0..360°) This coordinate form is advised if working in an area near the date border in the pacific ocean.
